AND user_Id = #{userId}

mapper.update: UPDATE tb_healthyfiles a, tb_surgery b, tb_internal c SET a.del_flag = 1, b.del_flag = 1, c.del_flag = 1, a.updateId = #{updateId}, a.updatetime = current_time, b.updateId = #{updateId}, b.updatetime = current_time, c.updateId = #{updateId}, c.updatetime = current_time WHERE a.id = b.healthy_Id AND a.id = c.healthy_Id AND a.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.older_id AS olderId,a.user_id AS userId,a.height,a.weight, a.nation,b.birthday,a.native_place AS nativePlace,a.marital_status AS maritalStatus,a.work_year AS workYear,a.education_level AS educationLevel,a.career,b.older_age AS olderAge,b.sex,b.photo,CONCAT( d.community_place,',',d.community_name) AS address,a.files FROM tb_healthyfiles a LEFT JOIN tb_older b ON a.older_id = b.Id LEFT JOIN tb_user c ON a.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN tb_communities d ON b.communityCd = d.community_code WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.healthy_Id AS healthyId,a.skin,a.lymph,a.thyroid,a.spine, a.limb,a.joint,a.head,a.eye,a.ears,a.nose,a.oral_cavity AS oralCavity,a.throat,a.work_Id AS workId FROM tb_surgery a LEFT JOIN tb_healthyfiles c ON a.healthy_Id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT healthy_Id AS healthyId,a.heart_rate AS heartRate,a.blood_pressure AS bloodPressure,a.blood_sugar AS bloodSugar, a.blood_fat AS bloodFat,a.pulse,a.liver_function AS liverFunction,a.renal_function AS renalFunction,a.blood_routine AS bloodRoutine,a.urinalysis,a.work_Id AS workId FROM tb_internal a LEFT JOIN tb_healthyfiles c ON a.healthy_Id = c.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_healthyfiles a, tb_surgery b, tb_internal c, tb_older d SET a.user_id = #{userId}, d.user_id = #{userId}, a.height = #{height}, a.weight = #{weight}, d.older_age = #{olderAge}, a.marital_status =#{maritalStatus}, a.career = #{career}, a.work_year = #{workYear}, b.skin = #{skin}, b.lymph = #{lymph}, b.thyroid = #{thyroid}, b.spine = #{spine}, b.limb = #{limb}, b.joint = #{joint}, b.head = #{head}, b.eye = #{eye}, b.ears = #{ears}, b.nose = #{nose}, b.oral_cavity = #{oralCavity}, b.throat = #{throat}, c.heart_rate = #{heartRate}, c.blood_pressure = #{bloodPressure}, c.blood_sugar = #{bloodSugar}, c.blood_fat = #{bloodFat}, c.pulse = #{pulse}, c.liver_function = #{liverFunction}, c.renal_function = #{renalFunction}, c.blood_routine = #{bloodRoutine}, c.urinalysis = #{urinalysis}, a.updateId = #{updateId}, b.updateId = #{updateId}, c.updateId = #{updateId}, d.updateId = #{updateId}, a.updatetime = current_time, b.updatetime = current_time, c.updatetime = current_time, d.updatetime = current_time WHERE a.id = b.healthy_Id AND a.id = c.healthy_Id AND a.older_Id = d.id AND a.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.older_id AS olderId,a.heart_rate AS heartRate,a.blood_pressure AS bloodPressure,a.blood_sugar AS bloodSugar,a.blood_fat AS bloodFat,a.urinalysis,b.createtime AS createTime, c.photo FROM tb_internal a LEFT JOIN tb_healthyfiles b ON a.healthy_id = b.id LEFT JOIN tb_older c ON a.older_id = c.id WHERE a.older_id = #{olderId}
